Package com.lambdaschool.restaurants.repos

Interface RestaurantRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Restaurant,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Restaurant,​java.lang.Long>
    public interface RestaurantRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Restaurant,​java.lang.Long>
    The CRUD repository connecting Restaurant to the rest of the application

      • checkRestaurantPaymentCombo

        @Query(value="SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM restaurantpayments WHERE restaurantid = :restaurantid AND paymentid = :paymentid",
       nativeQuery=true)
JustTheCount checkRestaurantPaymentCombo​(long restaurantid,
                                         long paymentid)
        Counts the number of restaurant payment combinations for the given restaurantid and paymentid. Answer should be only 0 or 1.
        Parameters:
        restaurantid - The restaurantid of the restaurant of the restaurant payment combination to check
        paymentid - The paymentid of the payment of the restaurant payment combination to check
        Returns:
        A single number, a count

      • deleteRestaurantPaymentCombo

        @Transactional
@Modifying
@Query(value="DELETE FROM restaurantpayments WHERE restaurantid = :restaurantid AND paymentid = :paymentid",
       nativeQuery=true)
void deleteRestaurantPaymentCombo​(long restaurantid,
                                  long paymentid)
        Deletes the given restaurant, payment combination
        Parameters:
        restaurantid - The restaurant id of the restaurant of this restaurant payment combination
        paymentid - The payment id of the payment of this restaurant payment combination

      • insertRestaurantPayment

        @Transactional
@Modifying
@Query(value="INSERT INTO restaurantpayments(restaurantid, paymentid, created_by, created_date, last_modified_by, last_modified_date) VALUES (:restaurantid, :paymentid, :uname, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, :uname, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)",
       nativeQuery=true)
void insertRestaurantPayment​(java.lang.String uname,
                             long restaurantid,
                             long paymentid)
        Inserts the new restaurant, payment combination
        Parameters:
        uname - The username (String) of the user adding the record
        restaurantid - The restaurant id of the restaurant of this restaurant payment combination
        paymentid - The payment id of the payment of this restaurant payment combination
